text: Barry Holstun Lopez (January 6, 1945December 25, 2020) was an American writer. He won the National Book Award for Nonfiction for Arctic Dreams (1986) and his Of Wolves and Men (1978) was a National Book Award finalist. Lopez died on December 25, 2020 from prostate cancer in Eugene, Oregon at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:American novelists Category:American essayists Category:Writers from New York (state) Category:American environmentalists
title: Barry Lopez
